post.body: taught my foster sons to eat with chopsticks during dinner. go peas and carrots, what great tools to use for this. saw my lola jo 2day
new foster son today, 12 year old, good sense of humor and very grounded. hope he likes the other guys.
great choc cake + ice cream and laughter means a good time had by all. saying goodbye to one of my foster sons whose leaving tomorrow 4 home
everybody is home, fed, and in their spot! its been a busy weekend, both relaxing and productive..
welcome back miles. still waiting on one more kiddo away for a visit with his fam. then dinner and bed.
creating a veggie garden plot in my side yard. just finished doing respite for a 16 year old (great kiddo) receiving another from a retreat
back from my friends reception, loaded down with viddles, good memories and now for a cup of green tea.
going to celebrate tom and kate's wedding and meet some new friends
oh yeah www.nrginmotion.com. shopping and massage potentials great concept huh?
gonna give chair massage this weekend at the holly holly sale. details on my website. hope to see yall 4 a rub.
gonna do prosperos dec 21st 12 to 6pm. a girl, her hands, yo shoulders and her chair in a great venue. what could be finer. see you there
its all about the compost man! great weekend with the kids, lots of work cookin and eating and moving all about. do you remember age 12?
gonna make a run, out into the world: bank, stores, and home again for mondane living through the next 48 hours. wish me luck! :-)
Andrea Bocelli is serenading me and lola jo. her falling asleep me twitterin dogs knocked out in the back ground. ah peace shhhhhh
